page.title: 13FLORA AND FAUNA
page.content: ANIMALS. There are many different kinds of animals in and around Orton.The most common wild animals are hedgehog, deer, rabbit, hare, badger, mole,doormouse, rat, shrew, fox, squirrel and mink. BIRDS. The countryside around Orton is rich in bird life, the most common species being starling, jackdaw, crow, blue tit, thrush, sparrow, blackbird, wren, and black headed gull. Herons are occasionally seen visiting the village streams,and the kingfisher has been sighted in the village. FLOWERS. The most common types found in the area are buttercup, dandelion, primrose, bluebell,fox glove,cow slip, monkey musk, dog rose and bistort. TREES. There are numerous woods, plantations and copices in the area.Species grown include sycamore, chestnut,birch,oak,ash,spruce and fir.
